    Addison Ashworth

      (package private) void addCustomer​(ControllerMain controllerMain)
      prepares the form by giving you a blank sheet to make a new customer on

      prepares the form for an edit, filling out all the fields from the old customer object

      helper function for translating similar messages about fields being empty
      boolean isFormValid()

      • editCustomer

        void editCustomer​(ControllerMain controllerMain,
                  Customer customer)
        prepares the form for an edit, filling out all the fields from the old customer object
        Parameters:
        controllerMain - to pull data from last window
        customer - customer to edit

      • addCustomer

        void addCustomer​(ControllerMain controllerMain)
        prepares the form by giving you a blank sheet to make a new customer on
        Parameters:
        controllerMain - previous form to pull data from

      • setComboBoxes

        void setComboBoxes​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Country> countries,
                   javafx.collections.ObservableList<Division> divisions)
        loads the countries and divisions into their combo boxes and tells the program how to make them human-readable
        Parameters:
        countries - list of possible countries
        divisions - list of possible divisions

      • onCountrySelect

        void onCountrySelect​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        filters divisions list based on country selection using lambda expression. I chose to use a lambda expression here because its a very simple piece of logic that is unique to this method.
        Parameters:
        event - provided by JavaFX

      • submit

        Calls necessary interactions to convert View form to Model and database
        Parameters:
        event - provided by JavaFX
